definitions.definition: A forespin pitch thrown by rotating the index and middle fingers down and resulting in motion down "curve"
examples: He bit on a curveball in the dirt.

definitions.definition: An unexpected turn of events initiated by an opponent or chance; an exception or outlier .
examples: Life has thrown him a few curveballs .

main_definition: ( baseball ) A forespin pitch thrown by rotating the index and middle fingers down and resulting in motion down "curve"
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , chiefly US ) An unexpected turn of events initiated by an opponent or chance; an exception or outlier .
